author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ashtead Group Says Finance Director Suzanne Wood Notified Intention To Stand Down
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - Ashtead Group Plc:
* SUZANNE WOOD ‍WILL BE STANDING DOWN AS GROUP’S FINANCE DIRECTOR WITH EFFECT FROM 31 MARCH 2018​
* ‍ SUZANNE WOOD, FINANCE DIRECTOR SINCE JULY 2012, HAS NOTIFIED GROUP OF HER INTENTION TO BE STANDING DOWN AS GROUP’S FINANCE DIRECTOR
* ‍MICHAEL PRATT WILL SUCCEED SUZANNE AS GROUP FINANCE DIRECTOR.​
* ‍MICHAEL PRATT WILL SUCCEED SUZANNE AS GROUP FINANCE DIRECTOR​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
